snippet: Americans for Prosperity, a conservative advocacy group, will begin running television commercials asserting that the law will limit Americans’ health care choices.
abstract: Americans for Prosperity, conservative advocacy group, will begin running television commercials asserting that the health care reform law will limit Americans' health care choices; Republicans have staked much of their near-term political success on the bet that health care overhaul will be unpopular with Americans.
lead_paragraph: Americans for Prosperity, a conservative advocacy group, will begin running television commercials asserting that the law will limit Americans’ health care choices.

headline.main: Conservatives’ Aggressive Ad Campaign Seeks to Cast Doubt on Health Law
headline.print_headline: Conservatives’ Aggressive Ad Campaign Seeks to Cast Doubt on Health Law

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
